law.catch_line: Subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the Interagency Committee shall present a repo...
law.text:
Subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the Interagency Committee shall present a report before each legislative session to the General Assembly on:
the plan developed under § 10-306(a) of this subtitle;
the activities of the Interagency Committee; and
the status of services to seniors in the State.
